item.title: government asks why playoff not used for college football
item.description: a justice department official has said serious questions have emerged on whether the current college football bowl championship series violates competition principles under federal antitrust law.

item.description: operating under the umbrella of the american petroleum institute, the group will seek to improve the oil industry's self-regulation even as federal officials tighten government oversight.

item.description: when it comes to treating autism, there are still more questions than answers.

item.title: canadian politician wants to torpedo charlie sheen's smoking

item.description: as fast as you can translate n.b.a. lockout to italian, kobe bryant's fans jump to an easy conclusion: yes, one day he will be back.
